text: The Queen of Spades () is a 1982 Russian drama movie directed by Igor Maslennikov and is the sixth adaption of the 1834 short story of the same name by Alexander Pushkin. It stars Alla Demidova, Viktor Proskurin, Irina Dymchenko, and Elena Gogoleva. ==Other websites== * * Category:1982 drama movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Russian drama movies Category:Movies set in the 1820s Category:Movies directed by Igor Maslennikov
title: The Queen of Spades (1982 movie)
